availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Graves County, Kentucky, resident. Native of Ireland. Married to Mary O'Boyle Murray. Father of James Murray, Patrick Murray, Richard Murray, Michael Murray, Ellen Murray, John Murray, and Julia Murray. Resident of McCracken County, Kentucky, in 1854. Resident of Graves County, Kentucky, in 1862.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Graves County, Mayfield, p. 183B.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Graves County, Mayfield, District 087, p. 210C.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994046, McCracken County Births, p. 2.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 14857.
